apps.name: YTLite
apps.subtitle: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options.
apps.versionDescription: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundred customizable options. Features: Download videos, audio (including audio track selection), thumbnails, posts, and profile pictures. Copy video, comment, and post information. Interface customization: Remove feed elements, reorder tabs, enable OLED mode, and as use Shorts-only mode. Player settings: Gestures, default quality, preferred audio track. Save, Load and Restore settings. Clear cache once or automatically on app startup. Built-in SponsorBlock. And much, much more.
